Low Poly Islands Exteriors Pack

20 islands prefabs + 241 object prefabs

One texture (2048/1024/512/256/128px) and one material are used for the whole set

199 k triangles full set (exteriors)

Exterior props: bases, trees, lakes, stones, mountains, bushes, plants, corals, shells, clouds, candies, crystals, planets and much more! 

The pack allows you to build any exterior to your liking. 20 islands included!

Can be used for games, rendering, advertising.

If you have any questions feel free to contact me :)
